task.title: Publish Assets to Apps
task.shortdesc: Publish saved Assets to your Livefyre Apps from the Library.

context.p: You may publish individual or multiple items from the Social Search tab and from within your Asset Library. Clicking Publish will push the item directly to the selected App, and will not remove it from your Library.
context.note: To publish to an App, you must first create the App from within Studio.

step.cmd: Search for Assets within your Library.
Select the Assets you wish to publish to your site.

step.stepresult: The Publish to App dialog opens.

step.cmd: Select the App to which to publish the selected Assets.
